ygData.subject: RE: [shadowknight] Lifeleech quest
ygData.msgSnippet: - ... And if the gnome that is a part of the quest is KoS to you as he was with me without wolf form? I can see now how luring away the dragon armor guy can
ygData.messageBody:
-
> there's more than one method to do that part of the
> quest - simply have a
> decoy drag Karam Dragonforge away
>
> I've helped so many people do their quests and never
> went wolf form - those
> that insist on it are seriously in need of more
> creativity.
>
And if the gnome that is a part of the quest is KoS to
you as he was with me without wolf form?
I can see now how luring away the dragon armor guy can
help.. oh wait.. no i dont.

Creativity is wonderful... but doesnt always
help..sometimes you just gotta do what you gotta do.

If the gnome isnt KoS to you.. drag away.. but you may
not have a choice as i didnt.

Wherever a Light shines .. a Shadow is born.
Bathory D'Allatu
